ygData.subject: Re: Frost Spiral Al Kabor
ygData.msgSnippet: Max damage I ve seen is 42 per.  It varies below that quite often!  Yes, you would cast it upon yourself... not that it would matter too much as your are
ygData.messageBody:
Max damage I've seen is 42 per. It varies below that quite often! Yes, you would cast it upon yourself... not that it would matter too much as your are soloing anyway.

Valacian - 17th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Larimus La'shain [SMTP:larimus@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 1:46 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Frost Spiral Al Kabor

From: "Larimus La'shain" <larimus@...>

How much damage does Frost Spiral do to creatures around and if I'm
soloing do I cast it on myself?

TIA
Larimus
